parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The prompt to initiate the message stream

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description: Optional. The conversation to add the passed in prompt and llm response to.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: The id of the model to use.  If not passed, the default model will be used.

parameters.name: shouldSearchWeb
parameters.description: Indicator on whether to search the web.

parameters.name: shouldUsePlanTool
parameters.description: Indicator on whether to preplan execution

parameters.name: shouldRespondWithAudio
parameters.description: Indicator on whether audio should be streamed along with text.

parameters.name: textToSpeechSpeed
parameters.description: How fast the speech should be

get.summary: Poll the status of an ai image that is being created. Updates the db if image name is returned.

200.description: Prompt id to poll for image status, then get the image name.

post.summary: Have ai generate an image.  Store entry in image table, so the image is returned from all images endpoint.
Have AI generate an image and return it directly.  No db involved.

get.summary: Get paged images for the current member

200.description: Prompt id to poll for image status, then get the image name.

post.summary: Have ai upscale an existing image.  Store entry in image table, so the image is returned from all images endpoint.
